p: In the first step, electrical properties were analyzed during WAAM with a short arc welding regime to characterize the stability of the arc and short arc frequency. Welding voltage and current were measured with a rate of 1000 Hz for GMAW processes with varied CTWD from 12 to 52 mm. The following Figure 4 shows welding current and voltage for a period of 350 ms ( Figure 4a CTWD = 12 mm; Figure 4b CTWD = 52 mm). Furthermore, characteristic points of the electrical signals and droplet formation in short arc welding regime are exemplarily shown in Figure 4b throughout circled numbers in the diagram.
